r/w, but not journalling: are you sure?  ext2 is compatible with ext3

Latitude^:  http://www.fs-driver.org/ lets you mount ext2 in xp, which is compatible with ext3 (you can read and write, but it's not quite as safe as a true ext3 driver);  there's also several readonly browsers (which again work with both ext2 and ext3, and for read-only, there's no catch)
